name: OPEN 24/7
description:
"I'm so hungry right now, but there's nothing in the fridge.  I wonder if there's any stores open at this time of night?"

its a game about walking through an old city at night. inspired by the times i walked through town at 3:01 am to get some cheesy puffs from the store.

its not meant to be an actual game, with score or whatever. its just a small thing that you can invest your time into if you care enough. a man in black interviewed me about this game, and i will now put that "confidential" information right here.

HI: hi

WHAT WAS YOUR INSPIRATION: sometimes in late winter, i used to go out at ass-oclock at night and eat food at a convience store. my diet consisted of frozen mini pizzas, sugary diet cola, and cheesy puffs. The destination was pretty cool, but i loved being outside at night. have you ever been under a street lamp after dark? a must-do before you die.

ANY COOL MOTIVATIONS: not really. this was just a passion project that i worked since april.

DID YOU GET ANY FEEDBACK DURING DEVELOPMENT: oh all the time. i showed mostly my friends, and they played through every version of that game. most of the feedback was
"oh this is cool :)"

 but sometimes there was critique. ngl i wish they critqued it more. stop being such supportive and good friends guys :(

WHATS WITH THE COLORS: i wanted a color that could mostly resemble night without using black. so i chose purple. so thats why its purple.

HOW LONG WAS THIS IN DEVELOPMENT: april 2018

DO YOU PLAN ON MAKING ANYTHING ELSE: eh.

ANY SECRETS IN THE GAME: a few. aside from the obvious one in the second area.

ANY FANART: some. ill link it at the bottom.

WHERES THE MUSIC: the game works better without music. trust me. do you hear music when your walking around at night? no? then shut up. dumb. stupid question.

THIS IS JUST A WALKING SIMULATOR. WHERES THE GAMEPLAY. THIS IS BORING: u rite. but still, there are people out there that enjoy this sort of thing. me included. and tbh i wouldn't even consider this a "game" tbh. i've been treating this more like an art project.

ARE YOU SATISFIED WITH THE END RESULT: i mean kinda. i wanted to make a certain thing, and then i did. so i guess in that case im satisfied. did i succeed? probably. could i have done better? absolutely.

DID YOU HAVE ANY HELP: no. i did all the art, dialouge, and tile placement. every creative choice in this game was mine.

DO YOU GO BY ANY PSUEDONYM? WHATS YOUR REAL NAME: i go by merch andise. unfortunatly thats my real-world name as well :(

HOW CAN I SUPPORT YOU: by leaving a nice comment. or a nasty one. just feedback tbh. im not doing this for money :/

ANY SHOUTOUTS: i was gonna shout out someone, but they decided to do some stupid stuff recently. so no shout-out for them.

WELL I LIKE THE GAME. I HOPE YOU DO WELL LATER IN LIFE: thanks. hope u do too guy.

FANART SENT TO ME :) :0 :D

"Sip" - SENT TO ME BY http://astrokitty2.tumblr.com/

":)" - SENT BY https://comical4u2.tumblr.com/

"Unfinished" - SENT BY anonymous
